taskbody.prereq: You must have access to NC State unity credentials to access student Personal Information. You will only be able to make changes to your own information. Dual authentication may be required.

step.cmd: Log in to the portal using your NC State Unity credentials.

info.p: On the Personal Information tile, you will be able to view and update all of your personal information, including:

ul.li:
Personal Details
Student ID Number
Name
Preferred Name

Contact Details
Email Addresses
Phone Numbers
